item.text: Now when the day of Pentecost had come, they were all together in one place.

<st data-num="869" class="">Suddenly</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="2279" class="">sound</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5618" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="972" class="">violent</st> <st data-num="4157" class="">wind</st> <st data-num="5342" class="">blowing</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4137" class="">filled</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> <st data-num="3757" class="">where</st> they <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="2521" class="">sitting</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1100" class="">tongues</st> <st data-num="1266">spreading out</st> <st data-num="5616" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3708">appeared</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2523">came to rest</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.
All of them were filled with the Holy Spirit, and they began to speak in other languages as the Spirit enabled them.
Now there were devout Jews from every nation under heaven residing in Jerusalem.

When <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">sound</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">occurred</st>, a <st data-num="4128" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="4905" class="">gathered</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="4797">in confusion</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> in <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="1258" class="">language</st>.

<st data-num="1839" class="">Completely baffled</st>, they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3756">Aren’t</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> who <st data-num="1510">are</st> <st data-num="2980">speaking</st> <st data-num="1057">Galileans</st>?

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="4459">how</st> is it that each <st data-num="1538" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="191" class="">hears</st> them<n id="1" /> in our <st data-num="2398" class="">own</st> <st data-num="3739 1080">native</st> <st data-num="1258" class="">language</st>?<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3934" class="">Parthians</st>, <st data-num="3370" class="">Medes</st>, <st data-num="1639" class="">Elamites</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2730" class="">residents</st> of <st data-num="3318" class="">Mesopotamia</st>, <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2587" class="">Cappadocia</st>, <st data-num="4195" class="">Pontus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the province of <st data-num="773" class="">Asia</st>,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="5435" class="">Phrygia</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3828" class="">Pamphylia</st>, <st data-num="125" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3313" class="">parts</st> of <st data-num="3033" class="">Libya</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">near</st> <st data-num="2957" class="">Cyrene</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1927" class="">visitors</st> from <st data-num="4514" class="">Rome</st>,<n id="2" />

<st data-num="5037">both</st> <st data-num="2453">Jews</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4339">proselytes</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2912" class="">Cretans</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="690" class="">Arabs</st>—we <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> in our <st data-num="2251" class="">own</st> <st data-num="1100" class="">languages</st> about the <st data-num="3167">great deeds</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has done!”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3956" class="">All</st> were <st data-num="1839" class="">astounded</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1280">greatly confused</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> one <st data-num="243" class="">another</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> does <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">mean</st>?”
But others jeered at the speakers, saying, “They are drunk on new wine!”
But Peter stood up with the eleven, raised his voice, and addressed them: “You men of Judea and all you who live in Jerusalem, know this and listen carefully to what I say.

<st data-num="3756 5613">In spite of what</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5274" class="">think</st>, <st data-num="3778">these men</st> <st data-num="3184">are</st> <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="3184">drunk</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> only <st data-num="5610 2250">nine o’clock</st> in the morning.<n id="2" />
But this is what was spoken about through the prophet Joel:

‘And in the last days it will be,’ God says,

‘that I will pour out my Spirit on all people,

and your sons and your daughters will prophesy,

and your young men will see visions,

and your old men will dream dreams.

Even on my servants, both men and women,

I will pour out my Spirit in those days, and they will prophesy.

And I will perform wonders in the sky above

and miraculous signs on the earth below,

blood and fire and clouds of smoke.

The sun will be changed to darkness

and the moon to blood

before the great and glorious day of the Lord comes.
And then everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will be saved.’

“Men of Israel, listen to these words: Jesus the Nazarene, a man clearly attested to you by God with powerful deeds, wonders, and miraculous signs that God performed among you through him, just as you yourselves know—

<st data-num="3778">this man</st>, who was <st data-num="1560">handed over</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3724" class="">predetermined</st> <st data-num="1012" class="">plan</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4268" class="">foreknowledge</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, you <st data-num="337" class="">executed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4362" class="">nailing</st> him to a <st data-num="4362" class="">cross</st> at the <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> of <st data-num="459" class="">Gentiles</st>.<n id="2" />

But <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="450" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="3739">him</st> <st data-num="450" class="">up</st>,<n id="1" /> having <st data-num="3089" class="">released</st><n id="2" /> him from the <st data-num="5604" class="">pains</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> <st data-num="2530" class="">because</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1415" class="">possible</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to be <st data-num="2902" class="">held</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846">its power</st>.<n id="4" />

For David says about him,

‘I saw the Lord always in front of me,

for he is at my right hand so that I will not be shaken.

Therefore my heart was glad and my tongue rejoiced;

my body also will live in hope,

because you will not leave my soul in Hades,

nor permit your Holy One to experience decay.

You have made known to me the paths of life;

you will make me full of joy with your presence.’
“Brothers, I can speak confidently to you about our forefather David, that he both died and was buried, and his tomb is with us to this day.
So then, because he was a prophet and knew that God had sworn to him with an oath to seat one of his descendants on his throne,
David by foreseeing this spoke about the resurrection of the Christ, that he was neither abandoned to Hades, nor did his body experience decay.

<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="450">raised up</st>, and <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">witnesses</st> of it.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3767">So then</st>, <st data-num="5312" class="">exalted</st><n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="1188">right hand</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> having <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="1860" class="">promise</st> of the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, he has <st data-num="1632">poured out</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">both</st> <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st>.

For David did not ascend into heaven, but he himself says,

‘The Lord said to my lord,

“Sit at my right hand
until I make your enemies a footstool for your feet.”’
Therefore let all the house of Israel know beyond a doubt that God has made this Jesus whom you crucified both Lord and Christ.”
Now when they heard this, they were acutely distressed and said to Peter and the rest of the apostles, “What should we do, brothers?”

<st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="2532">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="3340" class="">Repent</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1538">each one</st> of you be <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909">in</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="859" class="">forgiveness</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> the <st data-num="1431" class="">gift</st> of the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="1860" class="">promise</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> for <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who are <st data-num="3117">far away</st>, <st data-num="3745">as many as</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> will <st data-num="4341">call to himself</st>.”

With <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="2087" class="">other</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st> he <st data-num="1263" class="">testified</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3870" class="">exhorted</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="4982" class="">Save</st> yourselves <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="4646" class="">perverse</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st>!”
So those who accepted his message were baptized, and that day about 3,000 people were added.
They were devoting themselves to the apostles’ teaching and to fellowship, to the breaking of bread and to prayer.

<st data-num="5401">Reverential awe</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1096">came over</st> <st data-num="3956 5590">everyone</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="5059" class="">wonders</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4592">miraculous signs</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1096">came about</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st>.

<st data-num="3956" class="">All</st> who <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st> <st data-num="1510">were</st> <st data-num="1909 846">together</st> <st data-num="2532">and</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">held</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="537" class="">everything</st> in <st data-num="2839" class="">common</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they began <st data-num="4097" class="">selling</st><n id="1" /> their <st data-num="2933" class="">property</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5223" class="">possessions</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1266" class="">distributing</st> the <st data-num="846">proceeds</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st>, <st data-num="2530" class="">as</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st>.

<st data-num="2596" class="">Every</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="4342" class="">continued</st> to gather together by <st data-num="3661">common consent</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411" class="">temple courts</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2806" class="">breaking</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> from<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2596 3624">house to house</st>, <st data-num="3335" class="">sharing</st> their <st data-num="5160" class="">food</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="20" class="">glad</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="858" class="">humble</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>,<n id="5" />
praising God and having the good will of all the people. And the Lord was adding to their number every day those who were being saved.
